headline: Autodesk (ADSK) Earns Top Pick Status at Piper Sandler on AI Progress
summary: Autodesk, Inc. (NASDAQ:ADSK) is one of the Hot AI Stocks to Keep on Your Radar. On January 13, Piper Sandler analyst Clarke Jeffries reiterated an Overweight rating on the stock with a $373.00 price target. The firm has deemed Autodesk as one of its “Top Picks for 2026” in their recent analyst note. According to […]
